title: Black Hubba, New York City
content:
Last update:

Big up to @marksuciu for all these tricks on the famous black hubba in his new 'Verso' part playing on @thrashermag 🔥 . Check our friend donaldduck who investigated and mapped some of Mark's tricks on our app 📲 ➡️skatekrak.com . Check our #krakhistory clip on ➡️krak.to/blubba 📼 . . . #krak #skatekrak #krakmag #skateboarding #skateboardinghistory #nbd @adidasskateboarding @habitatskateboards @smlwheels @thundertrucks @rvca
